snippet: Twyla Tharp tackled the task of building a narrative ballet from the ground up. The result was a fantastical work based on a story by George MacDonald and set to music by Schubert.
abstract: Twyla Tharp tackles the task of recreating the centuries-old tradition of narrative ballet, with The Princess and the Goblin, a fantastical work based on a story by George MacDonald and set to music by Schubert.
lead_paragraph: Twyla Tharp tackled the task of building a narrative ballet from the ground up. The result was a fantastical work based on a story by George MacDonald and set to music by Schubert.

headline.seo: Twyla Tharp Creates ‘The Princess and the Goblin’ Ballet
headline.main: Tharp’s New Tale, Woven In Dance
headline.print_headline: Tharp’s New Tale, Woven In Dance
